pkgmetadata.longdescription: A reusable app that provides better app integration with AngularJS. Djangular allows you to create AngularJS content per app, instead of creating a single massive AngularJS application inside of Django. This allows you to selectively use apps per site, as well as create a consistent structure across all of your Django apps. This is intended to be a Django version of the Angular-Seed project (https://github.com/angular/angular-seed). The current mindset is to limit the amount of changes introduced by Djangular.
